markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Two-Weapon Flurry](/Feats.aspx?ID=420) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Press" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=133" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 153 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=57) (Level 16)

**Requirements**
You are wielding two weapons, each in a different hand.

</column>

---

You lash out with both your weapons in a sudden frenzy. Strike twice, once with each weapon.
name: Two-Weapon Flurry
requirement: You are wielding two weapons, each in a different hand.
requirement_markdown: You are wielding two weapons, each in a different hand.
